answers.answer: Why the doc wants to induce you at 37 weeks?

You can always refuse. You can refuse any medical advice you'd like. But 1st try to explain yourself calmly and just ask that you'd like more time. Also remember that if you are uncomfortable with your Dr's plan - get a 2nd opinion or switch Dr's.  YOU are in charge of your care and YOU have to live with the decisions made for your care. Don't let them bully you into something you're not happy with.If you do u agree that there is a medical reason you should be induced, you can try nipple stimulation, walking, chiropractic care, and acupuncture. Stay hydrated.
No I'm 37 Weeks 3 days Now I'll Be 39 Weeks when she induce me and because my baby is huge
Thanks for the info I'm just nervous to be induced i trust my dr but if I can find a way to do it myself I rather try that first
I am 25 years old first time mom and i was wondering how do i know i am going into labor cause i have been in pain for 2 days now
I'm a first time mom also I have no clue
I read that pineapple induces you naturally. If there's no medical reason to be induced, your doctor can not force you.
Primrose oil. Use 5 vaginally at night and 2 orally in the morning. Hope this helps
I dont think have a huge baby is the reason for induce you. Bit Im not a doc. So...go for a sexond  provisional opinion.
Yea i also have gestational diabetes I go for another app tomorrow so I'm going to ask alot of questions
They usually always induce at 39 weeks if you have diabetes/gestational.  Our babies tend to be bigger and they want to be able to control what they can since we're high risk
Oooh, now I see. Gestational diabetes.

Yes, there is a risk with GD of having larger baby, but not always the case. You could always ask for a second opinion if you are so uneasy about your doctor's recommendations for your care. Ultrasound estimates on size can be off too. I've heard it both ways...estimated large baby was average size and estimated average size baby turned out 2lbs heavier.
Yea 2 weeks ago he was weighing 6 pounds even so I'll just ask plenty questions tomorrow when Im at my appointment

question: My dr wants to induce me next week I'm a first time mom and rather naturally induce myself if I can is there anyway I can naturally Induce myself without them doing it please Help thank you
title: 37 weeks 3 days dr wants to induce next week's please help
